content:
Authoring and HTTP

Authoring and HTTP

  • Caching
    • Fine if each version and variant has its own name
  • Versioning
    • Fine if opaque to clients and Proxies
    • Content-Version is enough!
  • Security
    • Must control headers as well
    • Content-MD5 is not enough!
